petSelection.title: Pet Insurance Funnel
petSelection.description: Let's get started! What kind of pet do you have?

petDetails.description: We need a few more details to get your quote.

validation.validAge: Please enter a valid age (1-25 years).

pricingDisplay.title: Your Insurance Quote
pricingDisplay.description: Here's the personalized quote for your pet.
pricingDisplay.mockPriceDisclaimer: This is a mock price and configuration. Actual terms and conditions apply.
pricingDisplay.errorFetchingPrice: Failed to fetch pricing. Please try again.

productSelection.title: Choose Your Plan
productSelection.description: Select the insurance plan that best fits your pet's needs.
productSelection.basicPlanDescription: Covers accidents and illnesses. Essential care for your pet.
productSelection.standardPlanDescription: Includes Basic Plan plus routine wellness exams and vaccinations.
productSelection.premiumPlanDescription: Comprehensive coverage including dental care and behavioral therapy.
productSelection.disclaimer: Prices are estimates based on your pet's details: {{petType}}, {{breed}}, {{age}} years old.

contactDetails.title: Your Contact Details
contactDetails.description: Please provide your contact information to finalize your plan.

validation.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.validPhone: Please enter a valid phone number (10-15 digits, optional +).

confirmation.title: Congratulations!
confirmation.description: You've successfully configured your pet insurance plan.
confirmation.planSummary: You selected the {{productName}} plan for your {{petType}} ({{breed}}, {{age}} years old).
confirmation.name: Name:
confirmation.confirmationEmailSent: A confirmation email with your policy details has been sent to {{email}}.
